user.title: Mobile Alerts Setup
user.description: Click 'Submit' to create the Mobile Alerts integration. You can add your devices afterwards using the 'Add Device' button.

select_devices.title: Select Devices
select_devices.description: Select which devices you want to migrate from YAML configuration.

import.title: Import YAML Configuration
import.description: Migrating your existing YAML configuration to the new ConfigEntry format...

add_device.title: Add Mobile Alerts Device
add_device.description: Enter your device ID to add a new device. You can find the device ID in the Mobile Alerts app under Settings > My Devices.

error.no_devices_selected: Please select at least one device.
error.invalid_yaml: Invalid YAML configuration. Missing phone ID.
error.no_devices_in_yaml: No devices found in YAML configuration.
error.no_valid_devices: No valid devices found in YAML configuration.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.invalid_device_id: Invalid device ID. Please enter a 12-character hex device ID.
error.invalid_device_id_format: Invalid device ID format. Must be 12 hexadecimal characters (e.g., 090005AC99E2).
error.device_not_found: Device not found. Check the device ID and make sure the device has internet connection.
error.device_offline_no_data: Device has no measurement data (may be offline). Please make sure the device is connected and has sent data to Mobile Alerts at least once.
error.sensor_type_detection_failed: Could not detect sensor type. The device may not be responding correctly. Please check the logs and report this issue.
error.api_error: Error communicating with Mobile Alerts API. Please check your internet connection and try again.

abort.no_devices_in_yaml: Invalid YAML configuration: no devices found.
abort.no_valid_devices: No valid devices found in YAML configuration.
abort.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred during import.
abort.user_already_configured: Mobile Alerts is already configured. Use 'Add Device' to add more devices.
abort.device_added: Device added successfully! The integration will reload to apply changes.
abort.device_already_added: This device is already added to the configuration.
abort.imported_devices: YAML configuration imported! Creating entries for each device. Please wait...
